2089590.name: QuantumVR
2089590.description:
Learn to solve quantum algorithms in a playful way with QuantumVR. The game is based on escape elements in virtual reality (VR). By placing simple quantum gates you solve small quantum algorithms to free animals. Immerse yourself in the virtual game world and advance from level to level. Whether you are a beginner or an advanced player, there is a suitable mode for everyone.

The QuantumVR-App was developed at the Technische Universität Braunschweig in the project QuantumVR (FKZ 13N15399) in the frame of the funding initiative “Quantum aktiv” by the Bundesministeriums für Bildung und Forschung.
2089590.supported_languages:
德语*, 英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
